credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Clock case
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, graphite
description: Vertical rectangle. A circular frame is inscribed into a square; it has on top a base upon which a putto sits carrying a balance, and is supported by two sitting, winged sphinxes, turned outwards. Below is a base. Above at right strokes.
name: Drawing
